scc_rules.description: Check whether Virtual Servers for VPC boot volumes are enabled with customer-managed encryption and Keep Your Own Key (KYOK)
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This solution is meant as a non-production demo for consumers and is not enforcing boot volume encyrption.

scc_rules.description: Check whether Virtual Servers for VPC is provisioned from an encrypted image
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This solution uses a custom RHEL image direct from RedHat, and we do not control encryption on the image itself.
